> "One can only dig until heat, pressure, or bedrock gets in the way.
> They can't get as far as you credit them," Megtron bellowed, fiing 
> his mightycannon into the hole.  

Legacy
briefly considered retorting to Megatron's assertion that the Predacons
had fled straight down. Logically their path would turn at different
points, changing as they came to points were they
could not dig through. Instead however he just turned and watched as
Megatron opened fire on the hole!

> The blast was long a fair powerful, widening the tunnel entrance slightly
> as the eart ad rockwas heated and melted.  When the blast subsided,
> Megatron stood up straight to observe his handy work.

The
ground fairly buckled and distorted as the powerful blast turned stone
and dust into liquid and smoke and the power of Megatron's cannon reaching
towards the very bowels of the earth! 

As Megatron stepped back
to observe his handy work, steam and waves of heat blasted out of the
hole as newly created gasses were released from the hole into the air!
The hole was now several times larger, and perfectly circular as it
extended downward in the same direction as the original hole. The sides
of the new tunnel were now firmly packed, smooth and stone-like, steam
hissing from them as they cooled. The length of the tunnel extended far
into the darkness of the subterainian earth terminated somewhere far beneath the ground.  

"INTERESTING."
Legacy said as he oriented his arm cannon down into the hole and
scanned the results of Megatron's work. "THE NEWLY CREATED HOLE EXTENDS
SEVERAL KILOMETERS INTO THE LITHOSPHERE."

Beneath their feet the ground began to rumble . . .

"HOWEVER
. . . "  Legacy continued after a brief pause, "I AM DETECTING RISE IN
AMBIENT HEAT FROM THE INTERIOR OF THIS HOLE." Legacy began to
rise into the air, "I WOULD SUGGEST THAT WE RELOCATE OURSELVES WITH ALL
SPEED."

(TAG: Megatron, Kup, Grimlock) 

Preston
